text: Makkal Needhi Maiam (Translation: People's Justice Centre), is an Indian political party in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu and union territory of Puducherry. It was founded by famous actor Kamal Haasan. This party was started (launched) in a public meeting at Madurai in 2018 February 21. He also launched his party flag in the meeting. The flag has a symbol with six hands locked with one another. This symbol represents the co-operation between the South Indian states (5 States and 1 Union Territory). ==Important ideologies== * Quality education * Establishment of corruption free state * Standing against Religious and Caste differences * Bringing South Indian states together * No permanent Chief Minister for the state ==References== Category:Political parties in Tamil Nadu Category:2018 establishments in India
title: Makkal Needhi Maiam
